description: This file defines a React functional component called ConnectionForm, which provides a UI form for creating and updating connection configurations, including JSON configuration editing and optional OAuth connection. It also handles schema-driven input rendering, form submission, and error handling.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Updates the configuration state when a form input changes.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, invoking the provided onSubmit callback with current config data.

methods.name: renderFields
methods.description: Renders schema-driven input fields; falls back to a raw JSON textarea if no schema is provided.
